The ancient spirits bear the corruption, and curse, of Lok's death. I'd like to help them rather than simply slay them, but we need to understand their contamination.

If you brought me the spirit stones from the {@LinkCreature:28#3031#blighted jalmaraks}, it's possible we may find a way to save them. I make no promises, but the effort would be made.

These spirit stones are like everything else in this cursed woodâ€”tainted!

We shall study them in greater detail. That which is done may yet be undone. That is our greatest hope.
My research requires spirit stones from the jalmaraks, <PCNAME>. Please hurry back with them.
